issue.title: [Format][C++]Support the format of a COO sparse matrix that has separated row and column indices
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6485](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6485). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
For supporting non-copy interchanging of scipy.sparse.coo_matrix, I'd like to add the new format of a COO matrix that has separated row and column indices.
